document_data.name: ''Vidrinath''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Vidrinath''''', or '''''Lullaby''''', was a [[sword]] belonging to [[Tiago Baenre]].
document_data.Description:
Like ''[[Orbbcress]]'', the sword was made of translucent [[glassteel]] imbued with [[diamond]]s. The hilt was a black metal formed like a spider web. Its pommel looked like a spider's head, with two dull [[emerald]]s for its eyes.

It was later merged with Drizzt's ''[[Twinkle]]'' by [[Catti-brie]] on the Great Forge in Gauntlgrym, creating a new powerful blade.
document_data.Abilities: The sword was imbued with magic by a [[djinni]]. It could defeat some magical energy.
document_data.History: The legendary weaponsmith [[Gol'fanin]] forged ''Vidrinath'' in [[Gauntlgrym]] for Tiago Baenre in [[1463 DR]].
